resources:
DuckDuckGo Desktop App Try DuckDuckGo for Mac! Windows coming soon! The DuckDuckGo Privacy Browser for Mac has the speed you need, the browsing features you expect, and comes packed with our best-in-class privacy essentials. Join the Private Waitlist An error happened while joining the Waitlist, please try again later You won\'t need to share any personal information to join the waitlist. You\'ll secure your place in line with a timestamp that exists solely on your device so we can notify you when it\'s your turn. You\'re on the list! We\'ll send you a notification when your copy of DuckDuckGo for Mac is ready for download. macOS waitlist DuckDuckGo for Mac is ready! Open your invite You\'re invited! Invite Code` Ready to use DuckDuckGo on Mac?\n\nStep 1\nVisit this URL on your Mac to download:\nduckduckgo.com/mac\n\nStep 2\nOpen the file to install, then enter your invite code to unlock. Ready to use DuckDuckGo on Mac?

Step 1
Visit this URL on your Mac to download:
https://duckduckgo.com/mac

Step 2
Open the file to install, then enter your invite code to unlock.

Invite Code: %s Invite copied to clipboard Code copied to clipboard Share your invite
